entry.title: Combined summary - Nakapay - Proposal for payment method using client generated paycodes and federated paycode servers
entry.summary: The email sender is uncertain if their previous email was received as they sent it before subscribing. They have developed a system for requesting Bitcoin using only a six-character paycode, which can be accessed through their API that is documented on their website. The sender hopes to convince developers, merchants, exchanges, and payment processors to integrate their system into their own products. Despite objections regarding use cases and security, the sender seeks to explore possible uses and discuss security with the mailing list. In addition, the sender addresses the chicken and egg problem of needing users and developers for their product to succeed. Finally, the sender mentions possible monetary incentives for development and thanks the mailing list for their time and efforts to improve Bitcoin.
